results.title: Metformin Improves the Prognosis of Adult Mice with Sepsis-Associated Encephalopathy Better than That of Aged Mice
results.text_hl: However, few studies have focused on the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis_Associated_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065166 @@@SAE@@@.

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Brain Injury by Inhibiting Inflammation and Regulating Tight Junction Proteins in Septic Rats
results.text_hl: ... @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has a potent inhibitory activity against @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and oxidative stress, which inevitably occur in @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis_Associated_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065166 @@@sepsis-associated encephalopathy@@@ (SAE).
